titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Cooperative League of New York Photographs PHOTOS.138

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-01-21 15:42:32 -0500.

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives

did.unittitle: Cooperative League of New York Photographs
did.abstract: The Cooperative League of New York is a chapter of the reformist socialist organization,The Cooperative League of America, established by James Peter Warbasse in 1916.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Verna Rudd Kenvin sent a gift of glass negatives of the Cooperative League of New York in 1986. The accession numbers associated with this gift are 1950.151 and NPA.2001.103.

arrangement.head: Arrangement Note
arrangement.p: Materials have been arranged by an archivist within a single folder.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Cooperative League of New York Photographs document The Cooperative League of New York's hat store.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Cooperative League of New York; PHOTOS 138; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information Note
processinfo.p: The Cooperative League of New York Photographs were rehoused in a shared box in February 2013.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: The Cooperative League of New York Photographs is composed of five 8x10 glass plate negatives documenting the Cooperative League's hat store.
